backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, orders, and user profiles with access control, plus CRUD operations and stock management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables, typography, accessibility, and motion-reduction rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the root React app and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with query, identity, theme, and cart providers.
Component that checks Internet Identity admin permissions and conditionally renders children or access prompts.
frontend/src/components/blak/CheckoutFor: Checkout form UI handling shipping fields, validation errors, and payment method selection.
frontend/src/components/blak/FadeInOnVie: Intersection Observer–based wrapper that fades elements in when they enter the viewport.
frontend/src/components/blak/ImageUpload: Image upload component that previews an image and tracks upload progress using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/blak/OrderSummar: Displays cart items with product details and calculates subtotal, shipping, and total.
frontend/src/components/blak/ParallaxSec: Section with a scroll‑based parallax background effect and overlaid content.
frontend/src/components/blak/ProductCard: Renders a product card with size selection, hover actions, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/components/blak/ShopControl: Category, size, and sort selection controls for filtering shop products.
Main site layout providing header, navigation, cart indicator, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteOrder.ts: Mutation hook that completes an order by calling the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that updates the document title and meta description.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products and performing admin product mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products with a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, price totals, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout form, validates user info, computes totals, and submits orders.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact page showing contact info and a non-functional message form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with parallax sections and a featured products grid.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and navigation options after checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Renders the shop page with product filtering, sorting, and grid display, using hooks to load products and manage UI state. Shows loading, empty, or product results with animations.
frontend/src/state/CartProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for cart items with add, update, remove, and clear actions. Syncs cart state to local storage and loads it on initialization.
frontend/src/state/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing cart data in localStorage with error handling. Stores an array of cart items under a fixed key.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and animations, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, requirements, aesthetic guidelines, existing features, and image needs for the BLAK e-commerce build.
